channel.title: The best base server
channel.description: Hi im Andrew, and after the release of project cleanup I want to start on another thing for the community because im not happy with the server itself because it could have been so much more. So now im asking you guys what you want, I want to know whats the best base server out there (317 or 474 preferably) so that I can work off of it and bring the standards of the private server up a little higher for all, this of course will be released with 0 anti leeches so people can use it right away. So tell me your suggestions, I look forward to hearing them! -Andrew

item.title: The best base server
item.dc:creator: @glestrts glestrts
item.description:
@glestrts wrote:

Cleanup a battlescape. Or use rs377d.

Read full topic

item.title: The best base server
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“s 3 3 m 3, post:9, topic:371270”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=467357.msg3417696#msg3417696 date=1291246147]

DiscountDisregard all of the above

474 Hyperion

Fixed, discount seems like a poor word to choose though its not technically incorrect

For the record, I only posted this because a guy replied asking what kind of discount.

Does it really matter dude? Half the people on this site don’t know what PI even stands for.

Discount all of the above

474 Hyperion

Im going to go with your idea because I always wanted to try hyperion
[/quote]

Good luck, can’t wait to see what you come up with.

~Greg[/quote]
Thanks

Read full topic
